summary: This bill, the "Uterine Fibroid Intervention and Gynecological Health Treatment Act of 2025," authorizes the Secretary of Health and Human Services to award grants to states for programs focusing on early detection and intervention for uterine fibroids. These programs will include screening procedures, patient navigation services, and implementation of evidence-based strategies. The bill also mandates research on early detection and treatment, including disparities in pain management and other related conditions, and requires reports to Congress on grant outcomes and research developments.
